website_summaries.verdict: The Ducati of motorcycle jacks, this durable steel tool can lift almost any motorcycle with manual and automatic modes.
pros: Compact yet powerful, the Vivohome hydraulic jack can lift motorcycles weighing 1,500 pounds up to 15 inches high
Can be operated manually with a handle or attached to a compressed airline for easy pneumatic lift
Wears non-slip rubber pads for extra grip and a 3-position lock for added safety
Includes 2 tie-down straps, 2 adapter bars, and a detachable handle
cons: Rather expensive, and printed instructions can be hard to follow

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Easy to maneuver. Solid piece of equipment. Had no trouble lifting my Honda VTX 1800. Nice extra long tie-straps(included) came in very handy to secure the bike to the jack. Raising and lowering the bike is an easy one man operation with this jack. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Jack for 2006 Ultra Classic
customer_reviews.text: I use this to service my Ultra Classic. It is easy to operate and is easy to control up and down. Seems stable enough for my last round of changing oils. It was easy to assemble. Instructions were OK, but anyone needing this jack should be mechanically inclined enough to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Max C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A good jack for motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: The Jack seems well made and it was able to lift my bike with no problem. Assembly out of the box was simple and only took a few minutes. The only issue was the ratchet straps were not included in the box. I emailed the seller and they gave me a discount and sent the straps over separately, no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Ward

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The first jack I received in the mail was saturated in hydraulic fluid and was broken. It is easy to put together but the directions are terrible. I returned the broken jack and received the new jack pretty fast BUT the second jack was welded funny and I couldn’t get the pins out to assemble easily . I managed to get it together and the hydraulic pump was busted, it had sticky foot pedal, clicked, and didn’t pump very high. I give up on this jack and just want money back.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: It does the jobs that I need it for..I change my own oil on my street glide special and it allowed me to lift my riding mower and repair it....great product, good price...job well done...(blessings)
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is very important

customer_reviews.title: Works as a lift but has a really dumb flaw
customer_reviews.text: Overall this lift works well for the money. There's a ridiculous design flaw in the safety bar however. The bar only works if you put it on backwards from what it shows in the picture. Further, the feet of the bar don't hit the retainer notches that are elevated on the base. I took this item to my local welder and had him weld retainer notches that actually engaged with the backward retainer bar. Works great now. A really stupid flaw but easily fixed it you have a local welder. There are other lifts that are similarly priced that may not have such a bonehead flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Park

customer_reviews.title: great and does the job but I had to build a flat surface for my bike
customer_reviews.text: It's a great stand but but wish it had a extra removal piece that allowed me to have a flat bottom because my bike did not fit on the 2 horizontal bars. Maybe if the bars was adjustable that would have been even better. But I made it work by building a flat surface over the horizontal bars so my bike's exhaust could sit on the stand and it worked out. I love the straps give it a more secure stance. product is durable and great so far. I use it all the time for everything from cleaning my bike to fixing my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Requires some assembly. Essentially no instructions for that except for a couple of small exploded diagrams that you can use to try to picture where things go. Took me over an hour of staring at the diagrams and lift to figure out where the parts went. Still not really sure I did it right, but I got the lift to life. Will try it tomorrow when I work on my bike, and hope the whole thing holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my Indian Chief Classic.
customer_reviews.text: Quick assembly. Holds the bike well. Not the easiest to push loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Marsh

customer_reviews.title: It works on an 800lb bike
customer_reviews.text: I have an HD ULTRA CLASSIC and this jack works great. It come with tie down straps that I didn’t use. If I was going to Roll it around I would use the straps. Pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Golden1954

customer_reviews.title: Lift locks!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased this, but it arrived today and I’m pleased with the quality. I’m glad it locks in place so You don’t have to worry about the hydronic ram leaking. My 2006 Softail sits securely on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Buckhorn

customer_reviews.title: Not made for cruisers
customer_reviews.text: Has lifting arm cross members that impede access to transmission, crank case, and primary drains on Harley-Davidson cruiser motorcycles, which was the main reason I purchased. This causes the fluids to drain out onto the floor. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: Jack for my Indian Spirit
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about it lifting my bike, but it was no problem. Only a few steps to put it together. Feels very sturdy after installing the straps to keep bike steady once lifted. It's great for cleaning wheels and to store off the ground during winter to keep wheels from getting flat spots. Needs two people for safely using. Hopefully will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Ezydusit

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this product. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Martin E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk I jacked my motorcycle up one time with it and after letting it down it would not jack up again. Amazon was very good to return but do not buy this jack
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rahlf

customer_reviews.title: b'bye old scissor lift
customer_reviews.text: A bit too much paint on the pull handle mount but otherwise assembles easily. Unit gets a pounding in shipment, so be EXTRA certain that the 2 safety bar legs line up correctly with the stops on the frame. Smooth hydraulics, strong wheels, tie down points, straps ... beats the old, simple scissor lift hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Nun Chuckie

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Bought to change the oil on my Roadking and for supporting mini bike projects.
customer_reviews.author: Troy T

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something Cheap and Fast and this fit the bill. The construction is moderate to poor in quality.A bit shaky and crude in the details.Packaging barely covers the item and UPS driver immediately filed a possible damaged during shipping report on delivery.I had to adapt the lift plate to fit my bikes base as the adjustment options simply aren't there. I won't send it back but the thought did cross my mind more than once....actually I'm still thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cardellino

customer_reviews.title: happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lift, easy to put together. My packaging was pretty rough when I received it however, given the COVID-19 circumstances and the amount of things being shipped it does not bother me that badly. I was missing one bolt and one cotter pin but I had them in the shop so no big deal. The lift works great on all four of my bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment to find out AFTER we had put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with our '92 Homda Shadow. It is not wide enough. Customer service handled the situation for us politely.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: While the bike I am lifting isn't a high weight item (Sym Fiddle III scooter at around 350 lbs), the lift is very well build and solid feeling. So I did not feel concerned at anytime about lifting and leaving it up while working on it. The safety stops automatically engaged and felt solid.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Parts are missing according to the black and white photo in the instructions. Also the “instructions” aren’t helpful at all. I just winged it and put it together. The so called safety latches are nowhere to be found. It does what it says but not something I would rely on. Make sure you have jack stands.....real jack stands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot properly lift my 2019 Honda CNR500R or my 2018 Vulcan S
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work for me but there was no possible way for this to properly lift my 2018 Vulcan S or my 2019 Honda CBR500r. This is designed to lift motorcycles that have exposed chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for mid-price buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price, can't beat it. The added straps really make the bike stable for movement. Lifted my 700 lb Raider with ease. And I was able to move it around my garage and driveway. The only drawback (and I believe it to be with all lifts), is that on the lift, the balance point is such that the lift pads block the oil drain plugs. Jack stands alleviate the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Cannot Beat This Product for Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed a motorcycle lift so that I could work on the restoration of an old British bike. PERFECT item for less than $120. What is not to love?
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lifts my Harley Road King
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could service my Harley Davidson Road King myself. It easily lifts my 800 lb bike, and seems pretty sturdy. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Happy Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this motorcycle lift very happy with the quality of this product! Can't wait to use it when i change my oil on my bike this weemend
customer_reviews.author: Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Motorcycle Jack
customer_reviews.text: This jack stand is perfect for a motorcycle. It was easy to assemble. It came with straps which helped stabilize the bike when lifting by oneself.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary S. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Use the jack to install snow chains on lawn tractors
customer_reviews.text: This hydraulic jack is excellent and preforms very well!. I needed a jack to assist in the installation and removal of snow chains on my lawn tractor, this jack allowed me to free wheel the installation turning a lengthy two person, pain in the butt process into a fast, easy and simple operation. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Ann K. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, but I wish it was around 2 inches lower at it's lowest point
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of raising, lowering and locking feature. I did not like the fact that it does NOT fit under you bike as it states, I have HD 2016 Soft Tail, I had to roll my bike on a couple of 1x plywood to get it high enough to get the jack under it. Otherwise it's a good buy compared to the other ones where you need to turn it to raise it up.
customer_reviews.author: HI808Dolphins

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my husband. Very little assembly needed. Worked perfectly lifting his Road King.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Stable and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to assemble. Very poor directions. A couple parts came loose during shipping, fortunately they stayed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Its more like a piece of steel that just takes up space. The pump doesnt even hold pressure. This cant even hold up 876 lbs motorcycle. The pump it self leaks air and will not build pressure, such a waste of money I'd love to have a jack that actually could do what its advertised to do. Dont waste your money buying this, not worth $50
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. No instructions dosen't fit together right. Figured out how to get it together by looking at the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy sucker

customer_reviews.title: that it works
customer_reviews.text: work good a few times then hydraulic cylinder would not pump up
customer_reviews.author: Thad Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Other than the casters for mobility it’s doing it’s job
customer_reviews.text: The wheels that guide the lift is not what I expected they are made out of hard plastic and make it more difficult for moving my four wheeler around in my garage, even on very smooth concrete. Other than that it’s doing the job that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Winick

customer_reviews.title: The jack is good Used it once on my V900 Kaw
customer_reviews.text: The jack is good Used it once on my V900 Kaw. Was hard to get in place. I would be nice if it was about 4 inches wider for my purpose. Easy to put together Well designed
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great jack for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Jack works great. Easily lifts ultra classic. After strapping for safety I moved bike around on jack in garage. Would definitely recommend works well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A McClure

customer_reviews.title: Every bike owner should have one
customer_reviews.text: Some how one of the cast iron wheels broke during shipping, like a chunk fell out of the box when I opened it. Otherwise it does it’s job well and the ratchet straps that are included are fairly decent, a little thin on the strap themselves but works to keep your bike from tipping off the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Haacke

customer_reviews.title: Best for lighter bikes
customer_reviews.text: It lifts very well, but it is just a little bit on the light side for a heavy bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lynton C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jack for the money! Picked my Ultra Classic Limited like a toy
customer_reviews.author: NWPA Guy

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but loks just like whats being sold. I think I'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray W.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. It doesn't hold the bike steady. Slams down when lowered. Won't roll, even empty.
customer_reviews.author: Average Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Lift
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it came together when assembling. Very sturdy bought to lift my Harley Davidson Road King.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Moll

customer_reviews.title: Easy use and storage
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble the lift pretty easily. I was able to lift my Harley street glide special pretty easily and store it for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hering

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have a 2012 street glide it lifts and rolls with no problem. I have a small garage and have a narrow gravel driveway so it is hard to turn around after pulling into the garage so I use it all the time to turn my bike around in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meece

customer_reviews.title: I ride a 900 triumph
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had was lowering my bike down it drops it kind of quickly even when I barely touch the release pedal
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gino Bernato

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: dosnt fit under my bike. Had to make ramp 05 Red Horse Corsair.
customer_reviews.author: Deesystems

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Avoid. Cheaply made. I wouldn't trust my bike on it. Missing parts as shipped. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al

customer_reviews.title: same item for more money!
customer_reviews.text: It seems solid, but the manual is not only poorly written but inaccurate.I bought this item after returning another one that my wife bought, and is exactly the same item (B01DNNPMGC) and this one is too (B01CNBNQXQ) except this one is $25.00 more expensive. I decided not to return it because I can't keep on waiting to get another one. The difference, according to the description, is that this one supposedly has the capability to be lifted with air, but the jack is exactly the same as the other two items.Here are the links for the other two items.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: It works really good except sometimes you cannot make a go straight
customer_reviews.text: It works really good except sometimes you cannot make a go straight
customer_reviews.author: Gregg C. Yerington

customer_reviews.title: Product seems well built but in my order I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well built but in my order I was missing the bolts that secure the jack and had to go find them at a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ewing

customer_reviews.title: the jack might have some issue
customer_reviews.text: The jack won't lower.... i have to drain the hydraulic fluid out of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Item came with a broken stabilizer bolt and the mount that should be welded to the lift was broken off for that same bolt. Not exactly something you want to see on a lift. I needed it for a project, however, so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces to my order
customer_reviews.text: I am missing part of the Jack. The most important thing the hydraulic cylinder it did not come with the Jack and no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated it 5 stars except it came missing a few of the pins needed to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: patience putting it together
customer_reviews.text: the direction were backward putting it together but work great and does the job
customer_reviews.author: TONY LOVETTE

customer_reviews.title: Missing safety lock and bent locking screw.
customer_reviews.text: The lift showed up in a destroyed box, and was missing a part. The safety lock was nowhere to be found, and one of the locking screws was bent to the point of uselessness.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed it to do
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once, but it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a dream for me on my C90 with removing forks. Nothing negative about this lift but only one use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: go get a name brand one
customer_reviews.text: thing definitely works, but its cheap af. wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Preston crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The lift is very sturdy I have a 2017 ultra limited Harley over 900 pounds and the jack lifts it with ease no wobble very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: RANDY DUNN

customer_reviews.title: Great lift for working
customer_reviews.text: Worked great lifting my bike. The right locking bar I have to push down a little bit for it to catch but other then that it has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak welding
customer_reviews.text: The handle to move the jack broke lose the first time i used it. The sleeve the handle slides into popped right off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good jack, I recommend it to anyone that needs a basic bike lift.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Helmkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great price, very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in a timely manor. Performs very well, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L Tetley

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby, happy life!!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loved his birthday present which makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jil Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Measure bike frame
customer_reviews.text: Only issue i had was bike lifting pad brace was12 inches should be 16 inches other than that does its job.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT BROKOWSKY

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the motorcycles level and secured
customer_reviews.text: There are no dislikes it dose everything I need it todo
customer_reviews.author: eric burgan

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Appears to be well made. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Not an ideal jack if you’re actually working on your bike
customer_reviews.author: Brandon don Teague

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Package was damaged upon arrival. Missing bolts, washer and safety pins and a wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a motorcycle jack, works as described
customer_reviews.author: Rebel

product_meta.title: VIVOHOME Steel Hydraulic Motorcycle ATV Lift Jack Hoist Stand 1500 lbs
feature_bullets: COMPACT AND FUNCTIONAL - This compact hydraulic jack makes it safe and easy to service your motorcycle or ATV through a simple lifting mechanism which is able to hoist up to 1500 lbs
HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS - Made with a durable steel frame and high-quality, non-slip rubber lift pads, this jack is able to lift your machine without damaging itself
SAFETY FIRST - Comes with a 3-position safety lock mechanism, fix your vehicle without worry
EASY TRANSPORT - Built with a handle and swivel casters, the jack is easy to transport and simple to stow
MANUALLY OPERATED - The jack can be operated manually by foot pedal ; Comes with two tie-down straps, two adapter bars, and a detachable handle

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
